Title: Episode 6

Statham is rather pleased with himself for winning his radiologist's community weekly caption competition which does not please Joanna. She employs her vertically-challenged cousin to scare him but a trip to the incinerator is soon required.
Martin pesters Joanna for knowledge of his dad and hires a detective to find him.
